page.title: 17RELIGION
page.content: The main religous denominations are Methodist and Church of Wales,and Capel Y Dyffryn and St.Teyrnogs Church are the chief meeting places. { There is a reference to a church {in Llandyrnog contained in the {"Norwich Taxatio".The present building {is dated from about 1500 and is known {as a Vale of Clwyd type church,of {which there are 21 in the district,all {having a double nave. { The church has two priceless {possessions - the East window of the {North aisle and an Elizabethan {chalice. { }Capel Y Dyffryn was built during the 19th Century.The morning or afternoon sesion is devoted to Ysgol Sul(Sunday school) and children begin attending as soon as they are two and a half years old.
